# deleteRule

**Instance Property**

The rule to apply when you delete the relationship’s owning managed object.

## Declaration

```swift
var deleteRule: NSDeleteRule { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value is [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSDeleteRule/nullifyDeleteRule]. For possible values, see [doc://com.apple.coredata/documentation/CoreData/NSDeleteRule].

## Configuring Delete Behavior

- **NSDeleteRule**: Constants that determine what happens when you delete a relationship’s owning managed object.
